website_summaries.verdict: No need to rinse this rich leave-in conditioner -  it stays on the fur and keeps working for 24 hours. It's especially good for detangling fur in long-haired breeds, but softens shorthairs, too.
pros: Natural formula releases moisturizing ingredients every 2 hours to keep conditioning around the clock
Hydrates skin and coat using tropical guava and mango
Helps to relieve dry skin, itchiness and dandruff
cons: Some dogs with sensitive skin may have a reaction to the formula

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product, I was at my wits end with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, I was at my wits end with my dogs dry itchy skin from outdoor alergies. I tried this because coconut oil was not helping in the least except make her greasy and dirty from everything sticking to her. This has a great light sent, has completely cured her dry skin and no itching either. Highly recommend. Natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Poisonflower797

customer_reviews.title: I do love this and us it to keep my dogs coat ...
customer_reviews.text: I do love this and us it to keep my dogs coat moisturized in the heated house. It leaves the coat nice and soft. The flavor I received is the Guava & Mangostein and smells very good.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Chaffinch

customer_reviews.title: Be careful if your dog has allergies
customer_reviews.text: The smell is good but it only lasts for 1 minute after applying. My dog is extremely allergic to this product. 5 minutes after applying to his skin he was scratching. He kept scratching more, then he started panting and salivating. I gave him Benadryl and he kept scratching, licking and panting. I had to rub hydrocortisone cream onto his skin and it seemed like it helped but he laid there panting and trying to scratch and then one hind leg started twitching like it was trying to scratch something. I finally gave him 5mg of diazepam and he's starting to calm down. This is the ONLY thing that is different from what he's been accustomed to.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hester

customer_reviews.title: No good for my dogs dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: As for the product smelling great there is no doubt. I used this on my pitbull who has dry skin. She broke out into a terrible rash which left her so uncomfortable and uneasy, took care of it by giving her an oatmeal shampoo bath, but she still seemed to be a bit itchy since this product irritated her skin a bunch. This product also got really flaky and was all over her coat, it looked like as if she rolled around in a bunch of dirt. Will not be using this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Goldendoodle had an allergic reaction!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product the stars I did because it smells amazing, it de tangled my Goldendoodle’s tale really well, and it made her hair really soft all over. However, after it getting to her skin she had a horrible allergic reaction. She was itching so much she was whining. When I shaved her hair down to get to her skin it was red with big bright red patches that were starting to bleed! I’ve used tons of products on her in her 11 years and this has never happened.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Works well and smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Our little Pomeranian started losing her hair. After a trip to the vet to verify that there was nothing medically wrong I started searching for possible solutions. I ordered this because I could use it without having to constantly bathe her. I love the fact that a small amount is all that is needed just massage it in and it is not greasy. The scent is just wonderful. I am happy to report that whatever was bothering my little dog has resolved itself and her hair has returned beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Paula B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't be a victim of high number of reviews and stars!
customer_reviews.text: My pups coat made this lotion stinky!! I super love my pups coat but u bought it to make it softer and more shinier. It made the coat soft but it also does not look good at all. As you can see at the picture, my pups never got that kind of coat even before. Looks dirty and stinky! I also tried putting a lil bit and rubbed on my palm really good but still looks unpleasant! I regret buying this one! Also arrived leaked and broken!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted!! My miniature schnauzer has very fine hair that gets matted easily. He also has been having dry skin that has been causing him to itch recently due to the change in air moisture. So, I bought this stuff to try and Omg! Not only does this stuff make him silky soft and help his itchy skin, it smells incredible!!!! I love how it's a nice thick butter that can be rubbed down into his skin....it makes him so soft and smelling delicious! Hahah highly recommend! I will be keeping this as a staple in my grooming supplies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner us a life saver! Fantastic product! My darling, elderly Shih Tuz was recently diagnosed with Cushing's, an extreme case, with liver damage, that not has not only caused him to lose most of his hair, but also terrible skin dryness, with small tumors appearing all over his body. Most of the skin conditioning, skin calming conditioning products contain some sort of steriod in the form of Hydrocortisone, which is PRECISELY what he SHOULD AVOID! This product is STEROID FREE! I am so happy! It really makes his poor skin feel soft, its looking better, along with a prescription shampoo from his Doctor...I know he feels better. And it smells so lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps my me comb my new Maltese puppy
customer_reviews.text: This product has made our lives easier. We have a 4 mth old Maltese with cotton hair and this is our first non-fur dog. Though I comb/brush her twice a day, she gets a lot of mats. I’m trying to make grooming experience a positive one and have been struggling with mats. Now I put this butter right on the mat, work it in, and comb it out! It smells amazing and I’m about ready to put it in my own hair! Yep, it’s that nice!
customer_reviews.author: ShellGod

customer_reviews.title: Dog got a rash beware
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this it did smell amazing but within 15 minutes of using it my dogs skin was beet red! And I had to bathe her again to get it off her skin
customer_reviews.author: Crazy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Smells delicious and is non-greasy
customer_reviews.text: This hydrating butter smells fruity and delicious. I have a long-haired and double-coated dog and used some while the hair was still damp and then used a bit today while the hair was completely dry. The hair is a lot softer, easier to comb/brush, and a lot healthier and shinier looking after just one day. It's expensive for only 8oz for a dog with lots of long hair so I'll probably use this once every week or so. It is not greasy so it could probably be used daily or several times a week. Love the smell. Wish it were a bit more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Sharks and Barks

customer_reviews.title: Works great & smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this product & it smells amazing. I got the mango one. 😁 My dog has gotten dry skin since he’s gotten older and his belly is flaky and dry so I wanted to try a leave in conditioner on him. I did it after he had a bath on damp hair. (I was worried his fur would look different with product in it) but it doesn’t. His skin has improved plus he smells so good. Definitely recommend and will re-buy just for the smell lol.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Decreases knots and tangles in fluffy hair.
customer_reviews.text: Dog type: bichon/poodle/shih tzu mix Hair type: fluffy with long guard hairs. Wavy but not curly I purchased this product to find relief for my dog who has very delicate skin during a drying midwestern winter. It does help with the static and seems to significantly lower the occurance of knots and tangles. But is hard to get to skin. I found it most beneficial on the skin if applied right after a bath. Then with a blow dryer the hair and skin are soft and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER 4th time I’ve bought it & lasts a year or longer
customer_reviews.text: This smells fresh and yummy. Sweet but not gross and takes away wet 🐶 smells. Credibly moisturizing It has solved a lot of my dogs dry hair and dry skin issues I have bought it four times if you’re thinking about getting this you probably need it. YES it IS worth the money you better bet,put two tiny little balls on your hands on a slightly damp towel dried dog and massage that dog and they will be buttery smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph D

customer_reviews.title: Real moisture
customer_reviews.text: It provides non-greasy moisture. It doesn't kill the bacteria or whatever causes hotspots, but it is an excellent moisturizer for dogs skin. NOT Greasy! I have to put a cone on my dog's head so she won't lick it off. Smells great. I apply once a day. Best dog moisturizer I've bought.
customer_reviews.author: M. M.

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient and great for my dog's sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I use this together with Critter Concept's Anti-Itch Shampoo. The difference in my dog's skin and coat in just one application is amazing. My dog lost a lot of fur due to a flea allergy that led to her obsessively chewing her skin. It's been a little over a week since we started using this, and her skin inflammation has gone away, as well as her fur growing back. I love the smell of this conditioner, and I love the fact that it's a leave in formula since my dog hates baths and hates being rinsed off with the shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: She actually seems to like the smell and enjoys having this applied
customer_reviews.text: We use a wood stove in the winter to heat. It tends to really dry out the skin on our pit bull. She actually seems to like the smell and enjoys having this applied. Her ear was really dry and from scratching, she had caused a sore. We applied this lotion once a day (she did not react like it burned at all) and the wound was cleared up within a week. We still use it regularly and her scratching has really minimized.
customer_reviews.author: Danita Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not a game changer itching product on itching
customer_reviews.text: This product smells great and is not greasy at all. It did soften my dogs coat. It helps, I did still have some dandruff the day after I did a dandruff shampoo and the Warren London conditioner but was improved. My dog has anxiety, and is prone to allergies so I believe part of her scratching has to do with that. I want to be honest with folks as some think a bottle is a cure all. I will buy again. Love the sent and the feel of her coat after using and she loves to hear "lotion time". She knows exactly what that is.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but left white specks
customer_reviews.text: I will start by saying this stuff smells awesome! Based on other reviews, the product works amazing for other dogs, just wasn’t a fit for my dog. The lid was loose upon arrival, so the package was a mess and a lot of product was lost. My dog is a black lab and the conditioner left little white specks all over his coat. At first, I thought maybe it was dandruff, which was unusual for him. However, once I stopped using the product for a bit, what I thought was dandruff disappeared. Then, I used the product a few weeks later and the specks were back. Really unfortunate because it smells so great! Just didn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: WHY YOU NEED TO BUY THIS RIGHT NOW
customer_reviews.text: This product is INCREDIBLE and so far, the very best relief of the skin dryness problem we used to constantly have. This product cleared up both my dogs inner bottom legs and belly’s that were broken out in scabs, red bumps and it was all puffy. JUST 3 DAYS USING THIS PRODUCT AND LOOK [photo] this doggie lotion is a God send. It’s thick enough to last but thin enough that there isn’t an oily residue after you apply. Both dogs have short hair and it made a huge difference!
customer_reviews.author: Lexie

customer_reviews.title: Helped my itchy Yorkie in one day!
customer_reviews.text: I wonder if I am leaving a review too soon but my dog DJ is so happy and he insisted that I let you know that today. I have tried all types of things for his dry flaky skin. Today I gave him a bath and rubbed in the leave in conditioner and he ran around the house about ten times at high speed. Then he came to lick me several times. His skin is not flaky right now. He is finally comfortable. Thank you so much! I tried to take a picture but he wont stay still , he is too happy.
customer_reviews.author: Chelesse Edwards

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN
customer_reviews.text: This lotion smells amazing but it made my Boston Terrier break out in terrible hives! If your dog has sensitive skin this is not the lotion for them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I loved the smell and consistency of this product but it made my dogs swell up and have a rash. The ingredients are not all that good either so buy with care. I returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Helped my dog's dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I took advice from another review on here to put it on after I had dried and combed out my dog from the bath and it seemed to work better than putting it on him dry. It does have a nice soft smell and my dog drastically stopped scratching as much after I lathered him in it. A little goes a long way. I am sure I will be ordering more when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Ecrabb

customer_reviews.title: My pup feels and smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: He hates bath time but when we're done he is on top of the world. We play bullfighter and guess who's the bull. The towel is not red but he still charges after it and it's great fun. I managed to put a little of this conditioner on his coat before he was dry and I cannot get over how fluffy and silky he feels and looks. He seems to be happier too.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Not great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It smells so good! It is silky and made my dog’s skin very soft after her bath (she doesn’t have much fur). However, she has sensitive skin and gets hot spots and this product definitely increased her break outs. I would recommend this product for dogs who are not prone to this type of thing.
customer_reviews.author: Anna W.

customer_reviews.title: Small bottle, unsure if ingredients are safe for dogs to ingest
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but the size is too small for the price. Good smell and I'm assuming it's safe for my dogs to lick since it's a leave in but there are a few ingredients I'm not sure are ok. I follow holistic and natural care and am not so sure this is ok for my dogs to lick.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth krzyzewski

customer_reviews.title: Puppy smooth!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think much about this product. Had hoped for my frenchie pup but didn’t have high expectations. She had flaky skin but wasn’t itching it or anything. I just didn’t like to see her flake so much so i tried this. After the first Time i saw results. But it’s not until the 3-4th time where i saw her completely smooth without any skin problems. The scent is pleasant and keeps her fresh. I still use this everyday or every other day so she stays soft. Keeps her skin puppy smooth!
customer_reviews.author: NPK

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product for your dogs dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: My yorkie had terrible skin issues..she was constantly scratching and her fur was very dry and dull. I tried pills, vitamins, switching her food and nothing changed..this was the first product that gave her relief and her fur looks amazing from the very first day of trying it i saw a change in her! Love love love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommend. So great for skin and hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have toy breeds (maltese, yorkie, shih tzus) and ALL of them get treated with some of this after their towel off from their baths. It helps their hair and most importantly, their skin! My yorkies LOVE a 2nd little bit rubbed on their freshly shaved bellies! This stuff is now on my reorder list!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy McRitchie

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience #2 Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Bad experience with this product!My Keeshond had a bad allergic reaction to this product.Do not know if it was the shampoo or conditioner, or combination. Couple of hours after bath, she started to itch & scratch insanely,skin turned bright red, and she was coughing a little. Gave a benedryl, put her in bath of OATMEAL shampoo to relieve her skin, several hours later finally relaxed and symptoms subsided a little, redness toned down - she went to sleep. Seems to be doing better this morning, but keeping my eyes on her, and anything unusual, we are off to the vet!
customer_reviews.author: run2it

customer_reviews.title: Smell is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells SO GOOD. I would use it as body lotion for me! Lol! We have a puppy who has a lot of dandruff, and she’s been playing A LOT outside so she tends to get smelly. Didn’t seem to really help with the dandruff, but her coat was extra shiny after applying and she smelled amazing. The smell lasts for maybe 3-4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Just an ok product
customer_reviews.text: This product was just ok. I think this product would work best with dogs who have curly or thick fur. My shih tzu’s hair was left greasy from this product and the scent wears off quickly. As for moisturizing her skin I can’t say it did that. Her skin still had flakes once her hair dried.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen DiGiacinto

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars All Around! I'm impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is highly rated in its reviews, and boy, it does not disappoint! After just one treatment, my dog's dry and lifeless hair was back to its beautiful luster and shine! The product delivers as promised, and is easy to apply. It has a light but pleasant scent, that not only smells great on your pet, but you actually don't mind it being on your own hands after rubbing it in to your pooch's coat. The only complaint is that my bottle's pump doesn't work, so I have to unscrew the bottle each time and apply that way. But wow - will probably be a lifer with this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: 007InLA

customer_reviews.title: Back for more!
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I need to state is this stuff smells so good! This is the only thing that seems to help our 2 dogs' skin. I was going though bottles so fast I explored other options like Omega supplements, Coconut oil and food changes. I am back to purchase more. This is so nice because once it's rubbed in it is not greasy. After about 2 days, the decrease in scratching is noticeable. Again, it smells so good that I don't mind it on my hands when I rub it on. I just wish I could buy bigger bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Never2Old2Hoop

customer_reviews.title: No more dry skin
customer_reviews.text: My dog had very dry skin and kept scratching the area under his front leg and really irritating his skin and making it red and raw looking. Been using this for 5 days and it’s insane the difference it’s made, his skin is no longer dry and he has finally stopped scratching himself. I washed him regularly and bought humidifiers but still didn’t make a huge difference. Definitely going to purchase a lot more of this because it’s worked wonders for my best buddy.
customer_reviews.author: fazli g.

customer_reviews.title: French Bulldog's coat so soft!
customer_reviews.text: My French Bulldog's coat can feel wiry especially in winter when she needs to wear a jacket and inside heating is dry. Daily brushing helped but not completely. A month ago I added this hydrating butter at the end of each brushing and the results are amazing. Her coat is silky soft, she hardly sheds anymore, and the butter is non-greasy. I simply put a dollop in my hands, dab it on her, and then massage it in. She's in heaven. Thank you for this great product!
customer_reviews.author: cpp

customer_reviews.title: This smells wonderful when I put it on my dog and makes ...
customer_reviews.text: This smells wonderful when I put it on my dog and makes her feel so soft, but I feel like she gets dirtier quicker after having a bath than when we don't put it on her. It must make dust and dirt that would normally fall off stick to her fur. If you have a dog that gets bathed often, I recommend this. If you want to go longer between baths, I don't recommend using this. Or at least just use it as spot treatment (like dry elbows and feet) rather than all over.
customer_reviews.author: KmS

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to moisturize my dogs. We live in a cold, dry climate and they have been itching lately. This lotion is exactly what I wanted. They both get very excited when they see the bottle. They love having the lotion applied. The scent is mild and pleasant. Their skin is definitely less itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming 827

customer_reviews.title: Smells Wonderful and Works!
customer_reviews.text: Very hydrating and soothing for itchy, dry, flaky skin. My dogs love the smell as does everyone who's smelled it. I even used it on my heals and elbows. Ohio winters are brutal on our skin along with the dry furnace heat. Using a "warm mist" vaporizer also helps with the dryness in the air.
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to help my fur baby with his dry skin however, it didn't much for him. He continue with dry skin. Although the scent is wonderful my hands were the only thing experiencing the moisturizing and the softness when applying it to his coat. I can't say it helped his coat since his coat was already soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will update!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product today so I can’t comment on the effectiveness of this product yet. I did find it interesting that a small bug was sealed onto the bottle. I totally understand that things happen so I’m not that upset over it, but it does make ya wonder...
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Not greasy and goes on smooth and absorbes quickly. Have made a huge improvement in my dogs dry skin. No more flaking and her coat is nice and shiny. Started using 2xs a day for a week and now down to once a day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked for us
customer_reviews.text: This product is truly saving my fur baby. He has had skin irritation issues since her was young. We have tried, changing his food, oatmeal baths , sprays, antibiotics, you name it. As he is older he gets a certain odor that older dogs do and after his bath we used this product and his itching was left to a minimal after just 1 use ...
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Weldon

customer_reviews.title: Teddy Bear Soft
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 Chuggies (Chihuahua/Pug Mix) and they shed a lot. I noticed that their coat was looking a little dull. Looking for deshedding shampoos I found this product. I ordered it to help enhance their coat. OMG! It’s makes their coat so soooo soft. I couldn’t stop rubbing them. I’ve notice that their shedding has decreased. Hoping that with continued use, it will stop completely.
customer_reviews.author: Quality over $$

customer_reviews.title: This is working great on all my pups
customer_reviews.text: This is working great on all my pups: miniature Aussie, Papillon, and long hair chi! In between baths I put this on them, coat, nose and paws. In AZ we are having a very warm summer and this is helping them tremendous. Plus on their coats, it keeps my Papillons' coat untangled even though she jumps in the pool every evening and this keeps it from getting too dry from the pool excursions:) Great Product, will definately be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: D T.

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing!
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a longer review on their 2-in-1 Shampoo and Conditioner if you want the full story! Nontheless, this has changed my dog's quality of life for the better. Couldn't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Captain_Obsidian

customer_reviews.title: Approved from the type of person whose dog is on a delivery meal plan
customer_reviews.text: This stuff Is great. I didn’t use it on my dog for one day and noticed it made a significant difference so my plan is to never go without. He actually hates lotions /anything that requires focus on a specific area of his body (cuz he’s weird) but he looks forward to this every day. Plus, when was the last time that you saw a lotion/butter product where the main ingredient was guajava extract! ? Also doesn’t contain any of the standard Cheap moisturizers like glycerin Or mineral oil and is alcohol free!
customer_reviews.author: Lia XYZ

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but my Shih Tzu hates it. HATES IT! He hates the smell he goes around the house trying to rub it off on anything he can. Non-scented would be great. If your dog is not picky about how things smell I would highly recommend this product. If he is picky well then you are like me and will have to deal with a fussy pup after use. By the way I like the fragrance used.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H

customer_reviews.title: A Product That Does What it Promises!
customer_reviews.text: Can you remove the picture with my maltipoo in the purple dress. I didnt realize my leg and bare foot was in the photo. Yikes! Wow!!! This product is Amazing.’ My maltipoo hair mat’s despite brushing her hair everyday. I was looking for a product that I could use to comb out the knots in her hair. This product did the job, and I didn’t have to coach her to sit still while combing her hair. I now realize her hair was so dry, and Warren London Hydrating Butter Leave in Conditioner did not make her hair oily. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Foster

customer_reviews.title: Good but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like it absorb very quickly and does moistures the dry skin but I think it is a little over priced. Because it is only 8 oz and only last for a few times of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Love This for My Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this twice already and running low so I'm about to order another. I absolutely love the scent of this lotion and it makes my fur babies' coat smell nice and feel smooth. I use it after I bathe them and a few times a week after their walks.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jo Custodio

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My dog had the worst dry skin I have ever seen. He was losing hair on the insides of his legs and on his belly due to the condition of his skin. I tried so many different lotions and other products for dry skin and hot spots but none seemed to really work. This product instantly made his skin feel smooth. I was amazed at the first application the difference in texture- his skin still looked horrible and painful but it felt soft. I saw real progress over the following weeks and now his skin is back to its normal color and texture- his hair is even growing back. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tori Peterson

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: My dog suffers from dry/itchy fur on his back, not a diet or allergy issue, just genetic as his neck is silky but his back is coarse. At times it drives him crazy rubbing against everything, especially after a bath Nothing seemed to help, then duh! Leave In Conditioner! I rub a little in morning and evening and NO MORE DRY ITCHY FUR He loves this product!
customer_reviews.author: Zenster

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I have Yorkies and I keep their hair long. It doesnt take much to get a knot. I've used other leave in conditioners/detangler which worked good but smelled awful. This has a light scent but its not offensive. Makes their hair soft and easy to get knots out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped my dogs hair grow back
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because my 12 year old dog started losing his hair and the vet said it was alopecia. His skin seemed really dry and flakey so I wanted to try a lotion on him. To my surprise, his hair has started coming back! I didn't think this would help his hair growth but it was a great surprise when visitors started commenting on the amount of hair that he had! I love the smell, too!
customer_reviews.author: Khali

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good, leaves puppy shiny and soft
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. It absorbed very quickly Into my baby’s soft and sensitive fur. It smells AMAZING! He did not get itchy after I applied it. I used a small amount and rubbed into my hands and all over his body and onto his skin and fur. Then brushed him out. It left him looking smooth and sleek and smelling great.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: My maltipoo's fur has never been so soft!! When I put this in his coat, he feels like a baby again. I've tried detangling sprays and different types of conditioners, but this seems to do the trick. The smell is very subtle and a little goes a long way. I will continue to buy this product. It works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Works well on my Pomeranian
customer_reviews.text: My Pomeranian gets a puppy cut in the summers and she always ends up with dandruff after her "spa" day. I was desperate to find something to moisturize her skin without making her oily and without having to give her frequent baths. I rub this on her fur and massage it gently so it penetrates through to her skin and I have to say, after about 2 uses I have noticed significant improvement. My only complaint is that I feel like you need to use a lot for such a little area. It smells great and it definitely works so I will continue to buy to stop her dandruff.
customer_reviews.author: KMJ

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: We have a pit mix that has allergies this time of year until the first freeze that is off the chart. For years he has itched/rubbed the hair right off his body in certain spots. He would jump up out of a deep sleep and just start scratching so hard that he would wince in pain. After the first time of putting this on him, he seemed to calm right down and even comes over to me to put it on when he sees me grab the bottle. I apply it twice a day and it has brought him such relief. I'm a believer so far of this product.
customer_reviews.author: slinny

customer_reviews.title: From Dry Skin to supple
customer_reviews.text: Getting rid of fleas seems to be a full time job in summer. Once under control my dogs skin need rejuvenating after they are gone. She finally stopped inching after rubbing a dab on her skin. Will use until her skin looks normal again. Smell is pleasant enough. Four Stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ !!4
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar Vogtmann

customer_reviews.title: The smell is to die for.
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is amazing. Game changer for my chocolate lab. He gets dry skin from his thyroid problem especially after a bath. This does the trick. I also use it in between baths to cut static Smells amazing. Soaks right in. No greasy residue.
customer_reviews.author: heidiachin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd had flaky skin so after researching what to do I ordered this product. Within 2 days of use his flaking stopped and disappeared as well as his itching!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki24

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: One of our smaller dogs gets itchy skin when the seasons change on his back area. I did some searching for a dog friendly lotion and found this. Pleasant non overwhelming scent, and easy to apply with the pump. Its thickness is perfect to work down onto his skin. We apply it several times a week during "itch" periods and always after we bathe him. He does itch less when we use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it I used it like normal conditioner while I was giving my dog a shower. It wasn’t until I read the bottle later on that I realized this is supposed to be used while your dogs hairs is damp! But it didn’t matter his hair was very soft anyways. Definitely recommend. Especially in the winter if your dog has long hair that gets staticky.
customer_reviews.author: passionfrootgreentea

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well on our GSP. She's a puppy and has been subject to extra baths for accidents and thus this was necessary to keep her skin and coat from getting too dry. Smells great and doesn't make your hands gross
customer_reviews.author: Rianna

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of dandruff!
customer_reviews.text: This product got rid of my dog's dandruff! Rub it into the skin because it works on the hair AND skin. I had tried a bunch of other things, but this did the trick. (Shh...I even discovered it works on me too! I rub it into my scalp every couple of days). Another benefit is that it does not leave things feeling greasy at all either. It also helps me brush out the tangles in his long-fur tail. Smells nice and fruity.
customer_reviews.author: sknappy1

customer_reviews.title: Works great but is just a lotion, not a cure for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Our Doberman is notorious for dry skin and while this doesn’t get rid of it completely it definitely gives her some much needed relief as well as makes her coat smell good and makes it nice and soft and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: U can see the difference this has made!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has terrible skin. Very flakey lots of hot spots and doggie dandruff. We have been using this product for 10 days and the difference is amazing! His skin is healing. He is way less itchy. We have tried so many products from changing food to oatmeal baths final found one that works!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells amazing!! We had fleas for the first time ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells amazing!! We had fleas for the first time and even after we got rid of them, our poor pups were still so itchy from dry skin. I can't say this eliminated the itch entirely as they did get a skin infection secondary to fleas (ugh), but this stuff definitely helped. It soaked in super quickly too, I'm glad we purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: AE79

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this for both my pitties with dry skin. Tried omegas and different food and the has what has helped their skin and made their for so soft!
customer_reviews.author: kt

customer_reviews.title: Works well for senior dog
customer_reviews.text: 11 year old lab’s skin was itchy, flaky, and hair would come out when I tried to remove flakes. Vet recommended this and immediately saw a difference! Her skin and coat look much better - I apply twice a week and massage it into coat.
customer_reviews.author: Raintrix Inc

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells like yummy goodness! My French bulldog suffers from very dry skin and since we started using it he not only smells way better his coat is shined, flake feee, and so soft! He loved when I rub the lotion on him! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Pump was broken SMH
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this for my yorkie puppy who has really dry skin. When I received it, the pump was broken/chipped off and sharp. Also turning it did not ‘release’ it to be able to pump. So that part is completely useless. I ended up having to unscrew the whole thing to get to the product. I would like a new pump to at least use it properly. It has a nice scent. I rubbed it in my hands, ran it through his hair and brushed it through. It’s moisturizing, my dogs coat does look shinier and I noticed him scratching less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Softens fur
customer_reviews.text: I have two fur babies that use this product after every bath. It makes their fur smell really nice and soft. A little goes a long way so it is worth the price. The smell is a little overwhelming though, even to me, and one of my dogs resists a bit when I apply it on him. If your dog has a sensitive nose or doesn't like strong smells, maybe you should look for something else - otherwise this is great!
customer_reviews.author: J...

customer_reviews.title: It Softens and Nourishes Dogs Hair
customer_reviews.text: This is an updated review. After using this product a few times, I've noticed that my dogs hair is not nearly as dry and is much softer. Glad I signed up for on going deliveries of it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth W.

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Gave my dog a bad allergic reaction. He lost a good portion of his fur from using this. You're better off buying something from a local pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Picture Perfect

customer_reviews.title: Not Sticky and Love the Smell!
customer_reviews.text: After researching a product for my little girl Chihuahua Lisa, I came across this product. Not only is it not sticky but helps my dog not to have such dry skin/coat. I sometimes apply this to her even without a bath to keep her skin smooth and not dried out. Smells great too! I just make sure after applying it that she doesn't lick it off.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Hoped for more
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for more honestly. Maybe I expected too much, but I have a golden retriever and I was hoping for really soft hair. It made his hair more greasy looking than anything and didn’t make it softer. I know there are lots of good reviews, but I wasn’t very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: LOVELOVELOVE IT!!! 🧡
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad i found this absolutely amazing product!! It has restored our mini-Schnauzer's fur from brittle and lifeless to soft and luxurious... and there are no words to describe what it has done for our Coton de Tulear!! We didn't think it was possible for a dog to be any softer than he already was. This is our nightly go-to for bedtime brushing!! The light guava scent is delicious and relaxing!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: It Works.
customer_reviews.text: Finally some product that actually works for dry flakey skin. We have a happy Yorkie-Poo now. Our dog has stopped itching. I apply this every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Casale

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: My corgi’s coat is pretty soft but there’s some spots where his fur is curly which makes it feel rough. I do feel a difference on areas which his fur is softer. Maybe I have to use it diligently before his rough spots get softer. Smells good though and it’s kinda like water based formula. Doesn’t have too much of a sticky feel after it dries off from his coat or my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya P

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it might be greasy but it isn't at all...smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My Mini Aussie loves this stuff and so does everyone who pets him. I give him a massage with it every few nights before bed. It seems like it will turn into a mess when you first apply the product to fur, but it dries very quickly into a silky, shiny, soft coat. Will order again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: scott davis

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product for my spoiled boy!
customer_reviews.text: I am going crazy over this lotion!!!!! Our sweet puppy has dry skin that always has him scratching. I have tried soothing/moisturizing shampoo but it's just not enough. This lotion is amazing! First of all, it's smells INCREDIBLE! I want to use this myself! It's got a fresh fruity smell and leaves his skin moisturized! His coat looks soft and shiny too! I will absolutely be buying this one again!!!
customer_reviews.author: K Clausen

customer_reviews.title: Really nice scent and hydration
customer_reviews.text: I use this to moisturize my long hair chihuahuas fur that looks very dry in the winter. It really works nicely. You see the difference within a day. Also it’s not oily or slick.
customer_reviews.author: Suzzzabelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product right after I shower my maltipoo and it helps alot with the blow drying process because her hair doesn't tangle and the scent is very good and lasting .. it leaves her hair very soft ,so yes I will be buying this product again
customer_reviews.author: rosa ramos

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I read previous reviews before purchasing and I am so happy I did because they are all absolutely correct. My Doberman gets very dry skin in the winter and this product completely got rid of the drandruff like flakes and made his coat so soft and smooth with leaving such a amazing smell. Best part it didn’t leave any residue at all. Will be buying this product for years to come A+
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie

customer_reviews.title: almost too good. My dog spent a lot of time licking ...
customer_reviews.text: almost too good. My dog spent a lot of time licking it off of her legs and rear end as she dried off in the sun. Her coat looks beautiful. I love that it is no rinse. I have enough trouble keeping them from running away while bathing them outside.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Made my dog's skin even worse, red and inflamed. Be careful if your dog has sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: MorganG813

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I friggin love this stuff. It smells so delightful! I have a pit bull/shar pei mix and he is prone to many skin issues, including dry skin and dandruff. I apply this and brush twice a week and it keeps his coat shiny, soft and smooth! Will definitely re-order when I begin to run out.
customer_reviews.author: kierysma

customer_reviews.title: excellent results
customer_reviews.text: this is great stuff. My newfoundland has dry flaky skin during the spring after applying its good for a couple days. Don't have to use it several times a day.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Crittenden

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work. Made my dog more itchy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would help soothe my cockapoo's dry itchy skin. Unfortunately, it didn't help her skin at all! Soon after rubbing it on my dog, her skin turned red and hot and she started to itch MORE than she did before!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs have somewhat dry skin, and rough paw pads. This stuff is amazing! I rub it on their coats every few days and on the pads of their feet nightly. They both look fantastic and their paw pads are nice and soft. I'm a customer for life! Oh and it smells phenomenal!
customer_reviews.author: Always shopping mom

customer_reviews.title: Danger for sensatitative dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a terrible reaction to this product. Her skin was so red and she wont stop scratching. If ypur dog is very sensatitative skin ..dont used this products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my pit bulls wiry fur!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has worked wonders on my pit bulls wiry hair. Her fur feels so soft and is so shiny just after the first use. I will probably do like some others have done and use it on her about every 2-3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hartmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Not for long haired breeds
customer_reviews.text: I would only use this product for short haired dogs. It does not work with long haired dogs, I consider it a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan George

customer_reviews.title: Good for itchy dogs
customer_reviews.text: One treatment and my dogs itching is much better. Smells gourd too!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Brown

customer_reviews.title: Working Wonders for My Fur baby!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this, because my pup was in desperate need for help with his dry skin. I've used this twice on him and his flaking is already gone and so is his constant need to itch. No more oatmeal baths for him! I am very impressed. Not to mention the scent smells so good I would wear it. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Leaves Coat Super Soft and Shiny
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful hydrating leave- in conditioner. I use it daily on my pups and it leaves their coat super soft and shiny. It also smells great. My dogs love the smell so much, they try to eat it. LOL
customer_reviews.author: SKC

product_meta.title: Warren London Hydrating Butter Leave-in Conditioner for Dogs Skin and Coat - Guava & Mango - 8oz
feature_bullets: Premium non-oily leave-in conditioner that hydrates, conditions, de-matts, and moisturizes. It will leave your pup's skin and coat feeling silky smooth without feeling greasy.

Dog Itching Skin Relief - Adds Vital Nutrients while Moisturizing and Conditioning. Helps combat dog dry skin, dog itchy skin, and dog dandruff. Works well as routine maintenance in between baths using dog shampoo, oatmeal dog shampoo, and dog shampoo for sensitive skin.

Works On All Coats & Breeds - Penetrates, conditions, and detangles the coat on long haired dogs while also softening the fur on short haired breeds. Especially popular with Boston Terrier, French Bulldog, Doodle, Golden Retriever, Labrador Retriever, German Shepard, English Bulldog, Poodle, and more!

Aromatherapeutic Fragrance - Leaves even smelly dogs fresh and deodorized. This moisturizer can be used in place of dog cologne, pet perfume, or a dog spray deodorizer. Use as a refresher in between washes. Works especially well with exfoliating dog shampoo for smelly dogs.
Easy To Apply - Simply rub lotion into the pet's coat and skin and let dry. No rinse! Use routinely in between baths, grooms, and shampoos.
